tc_games.app_data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value="== CENTOS ==
If server does not start execute this commands:
yum install libstdc++.so.5" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:FileManager" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<FileManagerConfig xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <EditPatterns>
 <string>*.cfg</string>
 <string>*.txt</string>
 <string>*.ini</string>
 </EditPatterns>
 <MaxEditSize>102400</MaxEditSize>
 <EnableDecompress>true</EnableDecompress>
 <EnableCompress>true</EnableCompress>
 <MaxCompressSize>52428800</MaxCompressSize>
 <EnableUpload>true</EnableUpload>
 <EnableDownload>true</EnableDownload>
 <DefaultFileName>custom.cfg</DefaultFileName>
</FileManagerConfig>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.Web.FileManager.FileManagerConfig,TCAdmin.SDK.Web" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:VirtualDirectories" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>1</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[SubAdminFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Sub Admin Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>2</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[ResellerFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Reseller Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>3</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[UserFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>User Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
</ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.VirtualFileSystem.VirtualDirectorySecurity[],TCAdmin.SDK" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2011-11-11 01:49:38" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2011-11-11 02:12:07" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_config_files.description: Contains rcon port and password info
tc_game_config_files.template: password = ![bf2rcon1] # Don't change the ip or port ip = $[Service.IpAddress] port = $[Service.RConPort] # Uncomment to write debug to a file (resides in root BF2 dir) # pythonlogfile = stdoutlogstuff.txt
tc_game_config_files.app_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2011-07-28 05:40:06" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2011-08-05 18:50:40" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_config_files.template: sv.serverName "$[HostName]" sv.password "" sv.internet 0 sv.serverIP "$[Service.IpAddress]" sv.serverPort $[Service.GamePort] sv.welcomeMessage "![welcomeMessage3]" sv.punkBuster 1 sv.allowFreeCam ![svallowFreeam3] sv.allowExternalViews ![svallowExternalviews3] sv.allowNoseCam ![svallowNoseam3] sv.hitIndicator 1 sv.maxPlayers $[Service.Slots] sv.numPlayersNeededToStart 2 sv.notEnoughPlayersRestartDelay 15 sv.startDelay ![svstartelay3] sv.endDelay ![svendelay3] sv.spawnTime 15 sv.manDownTime 15 sv.endOfRoundDelay ![svendOfRoundelay3] sv.ticketRatio 100 sv.roundsPerMap ![svroundsPerMap3] sv.timeLimit ![svtimeLimit3] sv.scoreLimit ![svscoreLimit3] sv.soldierFriendlyFire 100 sv.vehicleFriendlyFire 100 sv.soldierSplashFriendlyFire 100 sv.vehicleSplashFriendlyFire 100 sv.tkPunishEnabled ![svtkPunishEnabled3] sv.tkNumPunishToKick ![svtkNumPunishToKick3] sv.tkPunishByDefault ![svtkPunishyefault3] sv.votingEnabled ![svvotingEnabled3] sv.voteTime ![svvoteTime3] sv.minPlayersForVoting ![svminPlayersForVoting3] sv.gameSpyPort $[Service.QueryPort] sv.allowNATNegotiation 0 sv.interfaceIP "$[Service.IpAddress]" sv.autoRecord 0 sv.demoIndexURL http:// sv.demoDownloadURL http:// sv.autoDemoHook "adminutils/demo/rotate_demo.exe" sv.demoQuality 1 sv.adminScript "![modman3]" sv.timeBeforeRestartMap 30 sv.autoBalanceTeam ![svautoalanceTeam3] sv.teamRatioPercent 100 sv.voipEnabled 0 sv.voipQuality 3 sv.voipServerRemote 0 sv.voipServerRemoteIP "" sv.voipServerPort 55125 sv.voipBFClientPort 55123 sv.voipBFServerPort 55124 sv.voipSharedPassword "" sv.useGlobalRank 1 sv.useGlobalUnlocks ![svuseGlobalUnlocks3] sv.sponsorText "" sv.sponsorLogoURL "![svsponsorLogoURL3]" sv.communityLogoURL "![svcommunityLogoURL3]" sv.radioSpamInterval 6 sv.radioMaxSpamFlagCount 6 sv.radioBlockedDurationTime 30 sv.numReservedSlots 0
tc_game_config_files.app_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2011-07-28 05:40:06" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2015-04-01 00:00:40" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_config_files.template: sv.serverName "$[HostName]" sv.password "" sv.internet 0 sv.serverIP "$[Service.IpAddress]" sv.serverPort $[Service.GamePort] sv.welcomeMessage "" sv.punkBuster 0 sv.allowFreeCam 0 sv.allowExternalViews 1 sv.allowNoseCam 1 sv.hitIndicator 1 sv.maxPlayers $[Service.Slots] sv.numPlayersNeededToStart 1 sv.notEnoughPlayersRestartDelay 1 sv.startDelay 1 sv.endDelay 1 sv.spawnTime 3 sv.manDownTime 3 sv.endOfRoundDelay 3 sv.ticketRatio 100 sv.roundsPerMap 3 sv.timeLimit 0 sv.scoreLimit 0 sv.soldierFriendlyFire 100 sv.vehicleFriendlyFire 100 sv.soldierSplashFriendlyFire 100 sv.vehicleSplashFriendlyFire 100 sv.tkPunishEnabled 1 sv.tkNumPunishToKick 3 sv.tkPunishByDefault 0 sv.votingEnabled 1 sv.voteTime 90 sv.minPlayersForVoting 2 sv.teamVoteOnly 1 sv.gameSpyPort 29900 sv.allowNATNegotiation 0 sv.interfaceIP "" sv.autoRecord 0 sv.demoIndexURL http:// sv.demoDownloadURL http:// sv.autoDemoHook "adminutils/demo/rotate_demo.exe" sv.demoQuality 1 sv.adminScript "default" sv.timeBeforeRestartMap 30 sv.autoBalanceTeam 0 sv.teamRatioPercent 100 sv.coopBotRatio 50 sv.coopBotCount 16 sv.coopBotDifficulty 50 sv.voipEnabled 1 sv.voipQuality 3 sv.voipServerRemote 0 sv.voipServerRemoteIP "" sv.voipServerPort 55125 sv.voipBFClientPort 55123 sv.voipBFServerPort 55124 sv.voipSharedPassword "" sv.useGlobalRank 1 sv.useGlobalUnlocks 1 sv.sponsorText "" sv.sponsorLogoURL "" sv.communityLogoURL "" sv.radioSpamInterval 6 sv.radioMaxSpamFlagCount 6 sv.radioBlockedDurationTime 30 sv.friendlyFireWithMines 0
